name: Introduction to Astronomy
description: An introduction to the field of astronomy, including topics such as the Solar System, stars, galaxies, and the universe.

name: Observational Astronomy
description: An introduction to the principles and techniques of observational astronomy, including the use of telescopes, cameras, and other instruments.

name: Radio Astronomy
description: A survey of the techniques and theories of radio astronomy, including the use of radio telescopes and the interpretation of radio astronomical data.

name: Astrophysics
description: An introduction to the physical principles underlying astronomical phenomena, including stellar structure and evolution, star formation, interstellar medium, and galaxies.
